meanings.definition: A person who engages in dishonest or illegal activities to make money.
meanings.sent1: The hustlers were caught stealing from the store.
meanings.sent2: The city is full of hustlers trying to scam people.
meanings.sent3: The hustlers tried to sell fake watches on the street.
meanings.sent4: Beware of the hustlers who promise easy money schemes.
meanings.sent5: The hustlers in the movie were portrayed as cunning and sly.

meanings.definition: A person who aggressively seeks opportunities to make money.
meanings.sent1: The hustlers were always looking for new business ventures.
meanings.sent2: Successful entrepreneurs are often seen as hustlers in the business world.
meanings.sent3: The hustlers were determined to make a profit no matter what.
meanings.sent4: She was a hustler, constantly on the lookout for investment opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The young hustlers started their own small businesses in the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: A person who is skilled at deceiving others.
meanings.sent1: The hustlers tricked people into buying fake products.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a hustler who could talk her way out of any situation.
meanings.sent3: The hustlers pretended to be experts to gain trust.
meanings.sent4: He was a smooth-talking hustler who could convince anyone of anything.
meanings.sent5: The hustlers used their charm to manipulate others for personal gain.
